Requirements¶

Cookbooks¶

  • deployer
  • ruby-ng
  • nginx (~> 2.7)

Platform¶

This cookbook was tested on the following OpsWorks platforms:

  • Amazon Linux 2016.03
  • Amazon Linux 2015.09
  • Amazon Linux 2015.03
  • Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Ubuntu 12.04 LTS

In addition, all recent Debian family distrubutions are assumed to work.
